461a7(mdo sde): mchod gnas dpal de la/ /zhun mar srang brgyad snyed ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs lha bdag ka ran dza byed tshe/ /de bzhin
461b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa blo gros legs sems la/ /bak+Sha ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs rin chen mthon pa rgyal bu'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
461b2(mdo sde): dpal de la/ /spos dang phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i tshong pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo dad pa la/ /sbrang rtsi bldag par
461b3(mdo sde): bya ba phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rtag can/ /lha ma mkhan tshe na bde gshegs blo mchog la/ /mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas
461b4(mdo sde): nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs bsod nams blo gros phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab dgyes gsal ba la/ /me tog dag gi tshun po phul nas kyang / /dang
461b5(mdo sde): por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sbyin sreg 'od 'phro thags mkhan tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid snang ba la/ /ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems
461b6(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /bde gshegs yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po ni/ /tshong pa byed tshe bde gshegs mi yi pad+ma la/ /ras yug zung du sbyar te dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni
461b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng+ge'i stabs ni shing srung tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos dri zhim pa la/ /se'u 'bru'i bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
462a1(mdo sde): do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo shing srungs tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mchog de la/ /a ti muk+ta'i me tog gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni
462a2(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs la/ /mar 'khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /
462a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs 'od spyod khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i dpal de la/ /phreng ba brgyus pa dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs glu
462a4(mdo sde): dbyangs shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mtshungs de la/ /gzims khri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde bzhin gshegs pa glu dbyangs
462a5(mdo sde): sman pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer la/ /me tog sil ma dag ni gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'khor lo 'dzin pa phreng rgyud tshe/ /de bzhin
462a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la/ /me tog sel ma dag gis gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dbyig mchog ral pa can gyi tshe/ /bde gshegs bsam
462a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab stegs de la/ /rtswa yi mal stan dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs 'jig rten dga' ba tshong dpon tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od
462b1(mdo sde): de la/ /phreng ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs ches kyi zla ba lag bla'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la/ /shing mchog dag ni
462b2(mdo sde): dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas grags pa phyugs rdzi yi/ /dpon po'i tshe na bde gshegs stobs chen la/ /'o ma dag ni dag ni dbul ba byas nas
462b3(mdo sde): kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin tog gos tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor ye shes la/ /ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por
462b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shes rab 'gros ni khyim bdag tshe/ /'khor gyi khyams dag phyag dar byas nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul blo gros la/ /dang por byang chub tu
462b5(mdo sde): ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzang dbul po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang blo de la/ /mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde
462b6(mdo sde): gshegs nam mkha'i dbyings ni tshong pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes pa la/ /na gza' phrugs gcig cig ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs
462b7(mdo sde): lha ni lha ris pa yi tshe/ /phyag dar dag ni bya ba byas nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs lha rgyal phyugs rdzi'i dpon
463a1(mdo sde): po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi bshes gnyen la/ /'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs
463a2(mdo sde): nor bu gsal ni dka' thub can/ /byed tshe bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba po/ /de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs

463a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la/ /kun dga' rab dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa shing srung tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs
463a7(mdo sde): pa brtson 'grus cher dgongs la/ /sge'u gsher dag gi dum bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge mdzad chu chun tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs

463b7(mdo sde): spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po ri mo mkhan/ /byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod pa po/ /de la me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang / /dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde
464a1(mdo sde): gshegs ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro 'gron po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs seng+ge'i de yi ni/ /lam srang dag tu dbul ba gding ba byas nas kyang / /dang po
464a2(mdo sde): nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng+ge'i mche ba dge slong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la/ /lhung bzed chung du skyu ru ras bkang phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni

464b2(mdo sde): shing ni bzhag pa byas nas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs de la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs chos sgron spyan ni dbul po'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo

464b4(mdo sde): rgyal po la/ /bu ram shing gi bcud khu btung ba phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs stobs chen tshong pa'i chung ma'i tshe/ /phye khal gsum ni gnyug mar bzhag nas kyang / /
464b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba la/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs shes rab me tog ded dpon tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stabs kyi mchog ma de'i/ /
464b6(mdo sde): lam srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs brtan pa'i dbyangs ni ded dpon tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer la/ /
464b7(mdo sde): gos kyi bla bre dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde ldan smad tshong tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi sems pa la/ /sha yi phur ma
465a1(mdo sde): dag ni phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don gsung tshong pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can rab mchog la/ /sha
465a2(mdo sde): kha'i gdan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs dgyes gsal grong rdal ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud dgyes de la/ /khar
465a3(mdo sde): dag dang sbyar ba'i btung ba phul/ /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs seng+ge'i zhal ni phreng rgyud tshe/ /bde gshegs kha dog zil gyis mi non la/ /me tog khal bcu
465a4(mdo sde): dag gis gtor nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phung shing srung tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la/ /spos dang a mra'i
465a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu phul nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad slong ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po yi/ /bshos dag bdag nyid
465a6(mdo sde): btsongs te sbyar nas kyang / /dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas stong gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
465a7(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de ltar sangs rgyas dag la chung ba yi/ /yon phul rnam par smin pa 'di dag yin/ /'khor tshe de yi 'bras bu de 'dra na/ /mkhas pa su zhig
465b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems mi bskyed/ /nam mkha' dag gi tshad dag bzung ba dang / /rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nas kyi/ /sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyi/ /bsod nams tshad gzung bar
465b2(mdo sde): ni nus par dka'/ /ji srid mya ngan 'das bde ma reg par/ /de srid mi khom sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas/ /bag yod mi yis bkur sti mchod
465b3(mdo sde): pa gyis/ /sangs rgyas dag la lhag par mos pa'i tshe/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la/ /mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan mtha'/ /bsam par nus ma yin na de lta
465b4(mdo sde): zhog / byang chub sems kyi rgyal bar yon phul dang / /gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang / /nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams rnams dag /ston pa ma gtogs
465b5(mdo sde): shes par nus pa med/ /gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes bzung phyir/ /byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar/ /dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi/ /
465b6(mdo sde): gter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba yi/ /rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang / /sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dga' mdzad bzhi/ /
465b7(mdo sde): rtogs byed 'jug pa dag ni brgyad khri dang / /rtogs par byed pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / /bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri dang / /sa rnam 'byed dang ye shes bdun cu drug /sangs rgyas
466a1(mdo sde): mtshon pa spyod pa bco brgyad dang / /pha rol gnon pa lnga dang brtan pa bcu/ /spyod yul ther 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang / /gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan
466a2(mdo sde): gang | |mtshan dang dpe byad dag dang spyod lam dag / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin na/ /nyan thos sgra rjes 'brang ba'i smos ci dgos/ /mtshungs pa med pa 'dra ba yon min pas/ /des na
466a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod/ /gang dag byang chub mchog rab sems yod pa/ /de dang de dag mi dman mtshungs med spyod/ /de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed/ /de dag 'jig
466a4(mdo sde): rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho/ /bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas/ /char sprin lhun stug lta bur tshim par byed/ /gang de byang chub la zhugs 'jig rten skyob/ /de dag nor bdun
466a5(mdo sde): dag gis sdud par byed/ /gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang bzod byed pa/ /de bas byang chub gang zhugs skyo mi 'gyur/ /de yis yon tan de dag myur 'thob la/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag
466a6(mdo sde): tu'ang 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rnam par smin pas ngan 'gror lhung bar 'gyur/ /mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan don gyi phyir/ /mkhas
466a7(mdo sde): pa su zhig byis pa dag ltar 'gal bar byed/ /byis pa 'gal byed mkhas pa 'gal mi byed/ /mi shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob/ /blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas/ /
466b1(mdo sde): gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod/ /de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing / /gang dag shes yul rigs ldan sten par bya/ /dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni
466b2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor bya/ /sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang / /bskal ba khri phrag tshad med bzod byas na/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos/ /de bas sdug bsngal nyam thag dang du longs/ /
466b3(mdo sde): bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la/ /brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon/ /sbyin stobs shes rab mda' yis bdud bcom ste/ /pham byas byang chub dag la reg par
466b4(mdo sde): gyisu0f10 u0f10byams pa'i grogs dang sgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang / /dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spro byad dang / /stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyi zas bsten tshe/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan
466b5(mdo sde): thob par gyis/ /de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la/ /bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyong bar gyis/ /mkha' la ngang pa skad 'byin dga' ba ltar/ /thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thob
466b6(mdo sde): par gyis/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na da bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum rnyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur
466b7(mdo sde): te| de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston to/ /de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas des btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa/ /ting nge
467a1(mdo sde): 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di'i don kyang mi shes so/ /ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus so/ /de lta yin gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs
467a2(mdo sde): pa la bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni/ bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba byas pas/ de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i/ /
467a3(mdo sde): mod la skal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba bsnyil nas de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to/ /khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyang thob par gyur to/ /byang chub ji skad bstan pa la'ang the tshom med par
467a4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to/ /thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to/ /log par ltung ba dang / mi khom pa dag tu
467a5(mdo sde): nam yang ltung bar ma gyur to/ /rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ khyod de'i tshe de'i
467a6(mdo sde): dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me
467a7(mdo sde): tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sras stong du gyur to/ /de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba
467b1(mdo sde): yin na/ klog pa dang / /lung 'bog pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba'i khor 'bum
467b2(mdo sde): snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te/ de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bas khang bzang gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dmar po'i chus btab pa/ /a ga ru'i bdugs pas
467b3(mdo sde): bdugs pa zhig phul lo/ /longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la'ang / de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur to/ /de dag thams cad la'ang bskyed mos tshal re re'ang phul bar
467b4(mdo sde): gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rim gro pa mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung
467b5(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de la des 'di skad du/ 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na/ khyim na gnas pas ni 'di rtogs par dka' yis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la khyim nas
467b6(mdo sde): khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya ba gor chag go/ zhes smras so/ /de nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sras khri dang / btsun mo brgyad khri
467b7(mdo sde): bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das des de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun gyi
468a1(mdo sde): bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/ /de dag gis thos nas kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ kye ma ting nge 'dzin ni mthong bar dka' mod kyi/ /'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di
468a2(mdo sde): legs par bris te bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod pa byas so/ /bzung ngo / /lung yang phog go /de nas de dag thams cad dus las
468a3(mdo sde): 'das nas slar de dag tshegs par gyur pas sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to/ /thams cad du ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to/ /thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin
468a4(mdo sde): 'di thob par gyur to/ /smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas thams cad kyis byang chub rab tu thob gyur to/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na
468a5(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po
468a6(mdo sde): blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni / dge slong rim gro pa shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gang dag sras khri po de dag ni/ bskal pa 'di nas bzung ste
468a7(mdo sde): bskal pa drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa gcig po de la de dag byang chub mngon par
468b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag blon po brgyad khri po de dag ni/ bskal pa grags pa chen po 'das nas bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu
468b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ /de la blon po brgyad khri po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa skar ma lta bu 'das nas bskal pa sum brgyar ni sangs
468b3(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
468b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag
468b5(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pas ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal bar bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
468b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang / /de dag rgyal po de yi
468b7(mdo sde): rjes su slob/ /yang dag sgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur/ /de ltar 'di ni dang pa chud bskyed kyang / /de bzhin rnam smin gya nom thob par 'gyur/ /de
469a1(mdo sde): bas g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis/ /'dir ni ci rigs bkur stis rnal 'byor gyis/ /rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags pa/ /de dag gang zhig mthong bar
469a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / /bstan pa rgya cher 'chad par 'dod pa dang / /ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis/ /yi rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na/ /'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te/ /yon
469a3(mdo sde): tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nus/ /'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed/ /byang chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang / /ston dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang / /sgrub dang snang ba gang dag
469a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya/ /las sbyong de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang / /lta sbyong de bzhin sred pa zad byed dang / /rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byor pa
469a5(mdo sde): dag u0f10'di dang rab tu ldan la dkon ma yin/ /de bzhin rnam grol spobs pa phun tshogs pa/ /bya ba thams cad spyod byed gzungs dag dang / /bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba/ /de dag
469a6(mdo sde): thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin/ /nga yis de snyed tshig gis brjod nus rnams/ /de lta bas na de dag 'dir sgrubs shig/ /kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byes na/ /phyi dus dag na 'gyod
469a7(mdo sde): par gyur ta re/ /pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan dang / /gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dag /lus rten byis pa'i spyod la gnas pa yis/ /shes bar bya ba rab tu nus ma yin/ /dus ngan
469b1(mdo sde): pa dang sems can ma rungs dang / /chos nub mtha' dang ngan song 'phel ba ni/ /mkhas pas shin tu yid byung byas zhes kyang / /bag yod ri dwags bzhin du skrag par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dga'
469b2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag la spyad pas ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba'i
469b3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar me 'gro'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems
469b4(mdo sde): dpa' grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
469b5(mdo sde): to| |lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed kyang rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go / lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das
469b6(mdo sde): kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag me tog gis chal bar bkram par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang
469b7(mdo sde): rnam pa drug du g.yos so/ /bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/ /
470a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / /lha dang / mi
470a2(mdo sde): dang | lha ma yin dang / /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa
470a3(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+d+he dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis zhus
470a4(mdo sde): te gtan la phab pa/ /
